sense.name: giving
sense.commentary: the activity of formally giving something (a prize or reward)
sense.examples: She read the winner's name allowed but he made the presentation.

sense.name: act of displaying
sense.commentary: PRESENTATION[+event] the act of showing something (introducing people or things or showing info)
sense.examples: He prepared his presentation carefully in advance. Her presentation revealed the hours of work she had done. The presentation of new data... The presentation was awkward since they had already been introduced.

sense.name: display
sense.examples: In cooking, it's not so much the taste of the food as it is the presentation.

sense.name: fetus position
sense.commentary: position of the fetus in the uterus to the birth canal
sense.examples: Cesarean sections are sometimes the result of abnormal presentations.
